scripts.build: make-dir dist && node makesrc.js && esbuild --bundle web-ifc-viewer.ts --platform=node --outfile=./dist/web-ifc-viewer.js && rm ts_src.js && cpy index.html dist && cpy ../../dist/web-ifc.wasm dist/web-ifc.wasm && cpy ../../dist/web-ifc.js dist/web-ifc.js && cpy ../example.ifc dist/example.ifc
